subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Indiana began its season on a 9-0 streak, but of the 13 teams that have started at 10-0 or better, only three have won the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Indiana began its season on a 9-0 streak, but of the 13 teams that have started at 10-0 or better, only three have won the N.B.A. finals.
